price: 71. Wanneer ijzeren halsbanden om hun nekken worden gelegd, en de ketenen zullen meegezeuld worden!
arabic: إِذِ ٱلۡأَغۡلَٰلُ فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ وَٱلسَّلَٰسِلُ يُسۡحَبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idhi al-aghlālu fī aʿnāqihim wal-salāsilu yus'ḥabūna
